org.quartz.simpl
Class SimpleClassLoadHelper

java.lang.Object
  org.quartz.simpl.SimpleClassLoadHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassLoadHelper
public class SimpleClassLoadHelper
extends Object
implements ClassLoadHelper

A ClassLoadHelper that simply calls Class.forName(..).

Author:
jhouse, pl47ypus
See Also:
ClassLoadHelper, ThreadContextClassLoadHelper, CascadingClassLoadHelper, LoadingLoaderClassLoadHelper

 void initialize()
          Called to give the ClassLoadHelper a chance to initialize itself, including the opportunity to "steal" the class loader off of the calling thread, which is the thread that is initializing Quartz.

Method Detail

initialize

public void initialize()
Called to give the ClassLoadHelper a chance to initialize itself, including the opportunity to "steal" the class loader off of the calling thread, which is the thread that is initializing Quartz.
